summary: A collection of unit tests for the Z‑Wave integration in Home Assistant, covering component initialization, device configuration handling, entity discovery, service execution, node entity behavior, state and polling management, and workaround utilities for device/component mapping.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the Z‑Wave integration to ensure reliable smart home device communication, accurate entity representation, and proper handling of edge‑case workarounds within the Home Assistant platform.
